Class Crawler

java.lang.Object
  Crawler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NexTagCrawler
public abstract class Crawler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Crawler: Abstract class This class is a model class for a feed crawler. All common methods and members are included for utilize in the derived class.

Author:
nkemav2
